name: Devresume
tagline: Resume for a software developer profile
body:
# Links for points mentioned in my Resume: 

+ **JSFoo 2013**
    + [Home Page](https://jsfoo.in/2013/)
    + [Slides of my talk](https://speakerdeck.com/ameyakarve/controlling-a-robot-using-the-html5-audio-api)
    + [Video of my talk](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YLHi5-CndG0)
    + [Code relevant to the talk on my Github](https://github.com/ameyakarve/audioHack)
    + [List of speakers](https://jsfoo.in/2013/conference#talks)
+ **Fantasy League for Euro 2012**
    + [Bangalore Mirror Archive on 10 June 2012](http://www1.lite.epaper.timesofindia.com/mobile.aspx?article=yes&pageid=9&edlabel=BGMIR&mydateHid=10-06-2012&pubname=&edname=&articleid=Ar00901&format=&publabel=MM&max=true)
+ **[Icarus JavaScript framework](https://github.com/ameyakarve/Icarus)**
+ **[Library application built during tenure as Literary Secretary](http://saras-lib.appspot.com)** ( not maintained any more; data also restored to some dummy values )
+ **Scrabble tournaments**
    + [Pune Open, 2013](http://www.indianscrabble.com/content/view/90/29/)
    + [Chennai Open, 2012](http://www.indianscrabble.com/content/view/84/39/)
    + [Chennai Open, 2010](www.indianscrabble.com/content/view/66/39/)
